sentences.sContent: With him at the helm, we are a hundred percent safe crossing these treacherous rapids.
sentences.sContent_eng: With him at the helm, we are a hundred percent safe crossing these treacherous rapids.
sentences.sCn: 由他掌舵， 通过这段激流险滩是万无一失的。

sentences.sContent: In the moonlight, when all on board were asleep, excepting the man at the helm, who was steering, she sat on the deck, gazing down through the clear water.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the moonlight, when all on board were asleep, excepting the man at the helm, who was steering, she sat on the deck, gazing down through the clear water.
sentences.sCn: 在月光照着的夜里，大家都睡了，只有掌舵人立在舵旁。 这时她就坐在船边上，凝望着下面清亮的海水，她似乎看到了她父亲的王宫。

synos.tran: 舵；舵柄；领导地位；驾驶盘

trans.tranOther: the wheel or control which guides a ship or boat
